insert into hospital (user_id, h_exponent_name, h_num, h_license, h_name, h_manager_name, h_phone, h_address, h_longitude, h_latitude, h_animal_type, h_picture, h_memo, h_memo_road , h_pay, h_sns, h_parking, h_isopen, h_lunch_time_start, h_lunch_time_end, h_interval_time)
values (#{user_id}, #{h_exponent_name}, #{h_num}, #{h_license}, #{h_name}, #{h_manager_name}, #{h_phone}, #{h_address}, #{h_longitude}, #{h_latitude}, #{h_animal_type}, #{h_picture},#{h_memo}, #{h_memo_road}, #{h_pay}, #{h_sns}, #{h_parking}, #{h_isopen}, #{h_lunch_time_start}, #{h_lunch_time_end}, #{h_interval_time})
mapper.select: select distinct * from hospital where user_id = #{user_id} order by h_id limit 1

SELECT h.h_id, h.h_name, h.h_address, h.h_latitude, h.h_longitude, COALESCE(h.h_picture, 'hospitaldefault.png') AS h_picture, h.h_animal_type, ( ST_Distance_Sphere( point(#{longitude}, #{latitude}), point(h.h_longitude, h.h_latitude) ) / 1000 ) AS distance FROM hospital h WHERE ( ST_Distance_Sphere( point(#{longitude}, #{latitude}), point(h.h_longitude, h.h_latitude) ) / 1000 ) <= #{radius} ORDER BY distance ASC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT h.h_id, h.h_name, h.h_address, h.h_latitude, h.h_longitude, -- h.h_picture, COALESCE(h.h_picture, 'hospitaldefault.png') AS h_picture, h.h_animal_type FROM hospital h WHERE h.h_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR h.h_address LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR h.h_name LIKE CONCAT('%', REPLACE(#{keyword}, '역', ''), '%') OR h.h_address LIKE CONCAT('%', REPLACE(#{keyword}, '역', ''), '%') ORDER BY h.h_name ASC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT * FROM hospital h WHERE h.h_id = #{h_id}
SELECT * FROM hospital_time ht WHERE ht.h_id = #{h_id} ORDER BY FIELD(ht.htime_week, 'Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday', 'Sunday');
